## Calculator.round() method

Round a value according to wished decimals

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static round(value: number, decimals?: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | Base value to round |
|  decimals | number | Number of decimals (2 is applied by default) |

<b>Returns:</b>

number


## Example

We want to round 3.14159265 with only 4 decimals

```
// Prints "3.1416":
console.log(Calculator.round(3.14159265, 4));
```
